org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.generator

Class OrePackageModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.generator.OrePackageModelBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PackageModelBuilder

    public class OrePackageModelBuilder
extends Object
implements PackageModelBuilder
    Builds an ORE packaging of the DCS business object model.

    Given a PackageDescription full of PackageArtifact containing types, properties, and relationships enumerated in DcsPackageDescriptionSpec, this builder will translate each artifact to ORE and include it in an ORE ResourceMap. The ReMs created from all the artifacts, as well as artifact content, is then sent to a PackageAssembler for inclusion in the package.

    Version:
    $Id$

      • getPackageRemURI

        public URI getPackageRemURI()
        Get the URI of the package ReM.

        This is not part of the interface, but is an add-on for the BOREM spec. The BOREM spec requires that the uppermost ReM be identified. This assures that an assembler can know what that ReM is.

        Returns:
        the URI of the package rem.

      • buildModel

        public void buildModel(PackageDescription desc,
                       PackageAssembler assembler)
        Create the resources that instantiate a package in a particular model.

        At the end of building the package according to a particular model, the PackageModelbuilder will have added one or more resources to the PackageAssembler, making the package ready for final assembly via PackageAssembler.assemblePackage().

        Specified by:
        buildModel in interface PackageModelBuilder
        Parameters:
        desc - A valid Package Description.
        assembler - The assembler in which packaged resources will be created.
